column1: The Pit Room////My wife and I were looking for dinner on Saturday night and decided to visit the Pit Room based on the reviews.  We got to the restaurant
column2: and there was no line (despite it being a Saturday with two major sporting events going on).  I ordered the two meat dinner
column3: with brisket and pulled pork.  You get two sides
column4: so I chose tortilla chips and mac and cheese.  My wife ordered the single meat dinner (pulled pork) with potato salad and mac and cheese.  Each came with a slice of bread and BBQ sauce.
